Enhanced Card System

Enhanced Card System

Highly flexible card components based on a registration system, supporting business flows, theme customization, and developer collaboration. Developers can easily create custom cards while the system automatically handles themes, internationalization, and business processes.

Simple registration mechanism with hot reload support

Automatically inherits global theme configuration

Supports detail pages, modals, and custom actions
